name: You Have 8 Bricks
description:
You wake up in a wall in some mysterious tower. You're pretty sure you don't want to be here. There's 7 guys just like you but still sleeping. Why don't you escape?
Maybe one of you will escape!
Maybe you'll unleash a powerful evil force upon the world!
Or maybe you'll just fail...

Warning: This game is challenging and will make your heart pound!

You'll know what to do.

'

You Have 8 Bricks (AKA Starling Tower, Pitful of Squares, You Have 9 Bricks, Bunny Tower, Last Brick in The Wall, The Pit And I) took me 26 months to finish, it's a linear game so you can finish it in 20 seconds. No cheating involved, just a lot of luck and amazing adrenaline response. That's more than a month for 1 second of gameplay!

If you like this you can follow me @rarykos
